ValidationRule.description: Field is Mandatory for all SG & HK applications
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name == 'EMAP Application Request', ISPICKVAL(Client_Name__c, 'ExxonMobil Singapore'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Card_Pin__c, ''), ISPICKVAL(Card_Pin__c, 'N') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field is mandatory. And it should always be 'Y'.
